mapper.select: SELECT SEAT_NAME_RES FROM MC_MOVIE_THEATER WHERE MOV_THEATER = #{mov_theater} AND MOV_THEATER_TIME = #{mov_start_time} AND MOV_THEATER_DATE = #{mov_screen_date}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MC_MOVIE_THEATER(MOV_THEATER_CODE, MOV_DATE_CODE ,MOV_THEATER, MOV_THEATER_DATE, MOV_THEATER_TIME, SEAT_NAME_RES , MID) VALUES(seq_theater.nextval, #{movieDateCode} ,#{movieTheater}, #{movieDate}, #{movieTime} , #{reservedSeat} ,#{mid})
mapper.select: SELECT MOV_THEATER, MOV_THEATER_DATE, MOV_THEATER_TIME, SEAT_NAME_RES FROM MC_MOVIE_THEATER WHERE MID = #{mid} AND MOV_THEATER_DATE >= SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 0, 10) AND MOV_THEATER_TIME > SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24:MI'), 0, 5)
